description:
Create movies quickly and easily with automatic recording functions, mouse tracking, and more.

Gadwin ScreenRecorder allows you to create movies quickly and easily with automatic recording functions, mouse tracking, and more. This software allows you to capture cursor movements, menu selections, pop-up windows, layered windows, typing, sounds and everything else you see on your screen. Gadwin ScreenRecorder is versatile and extremely easy-to-use. Just click the record button to begin recording. Its as easy as that!
